custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT User_.*, Contact_.firstName, Contact_.middleName, Contact_.lastName FROM User_ INNER JOIN Contact_ ON (Contact_.contactId = User_.contactId) WHERE (User_.companyId = ?) AND (User_.defaultUser = ?) AND ( ((lower(Contact_.lastname || ' ' || Contact_.middlename || ' ' || Contact_.firstname)) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(User_.screenName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND (User_.active_ = ?) AND (User_.userid IN (SELECT userid FROM pml_departmentleader)) ORDER BY Contact_.firstName ASC, Contact_.middleName ASC, Contact_.lastName ASC
